title: Butternut squash tacos
ingredients: ['1/2 butternut squash - peeled, seeded and cut into cubes', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil, divided', '2 teaspoons crushed chilli flakes', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 (400g) tin black beans, drained', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', '1 pinch salt', '1 onion, chopped', '1 red pepper, chopped', '8 flour tortillas', '50g chopped spring onions', '25g chopped coriander', '1 lime, sliced']
